#summary Mathematical operators.
#labels Language-Documentation

= Introduction =

FridgeScript provides C++ style mathematical operators for use in its [Expression expressions].


= Operators =
  * + addition
  * - subtraction
  * `*` multiplication
  * / division
  * % remainder from division
  * () brackets

= Example =
{{{
// this works as it does in C++, from which FridgeScript inherits its operator precedence
a = ( b + c - d ) * ( ( e / f ) % g );
}}}
